member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.ObjectEditorCamViewState.ApplyAxisLock(Duality.Vector3,Duality.Vector3,Duality.Vector3)
member.summary: Returns an axis-locked version of the specified vector, if requested by the user. Doesn't do anything when no axis lock is in currently active.
member.param: The base vector without any locking in place.
A reference vector that represents the base vector being locked to all axes at once.
The movement vector to evaluate in order to determine the axes to which the base vector will be locked.

member.summary: Provides data on how the grid layer should be displayed to the user. The default base class implementation provides reasonable values based on user settings and mouse coordinates, but certain editing modes might provide more suitable or specialized information instead.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.CamViewState.OnEnterState
member.summary: Called when the is entered. Use this for overall initialization of the state.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.CamViewState.OnLeaveState
member.summary: Called when the is left. Use this for overall termination of the state.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.CamViewState.OnShown
member.summary: Called when the becomes visible to the user, e.g. by being entered, selecting the multi-document tab that contains its parent or similar.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.CamViewState.OnHidden
member.summary: Called when the becomes hidden from the user, e.g. by being left, deselecting the multi-document tab that contains its parent or similar.

member.name: T:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.GameViewCamViewState
member.summary: Provides a full preview of the game within the editor. This state renders the games actual audiovisual output and reroutes user input to the game.

member.name: T:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.RigidBodyEditorCamViewState
member.summary: Allows you to edit the collision geometry of a .

member.name: T:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamViewStates.SceneEditorCamViewState
member.summary: Allows to move, scale and rotate the objects of a while providing a preview through the lens of the editor . User input is consumed by the editor and not forwarded to the game.

member.name: P:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamView.IsHiddenDocument
member.summary: [GET] Whether this is a hidden document in the editor's . This is typically true when storing the in a with multiple tabs and then selecting a different tab, resulting in the becoming hidden.

member.name: M:Duality.Editor.Plugins.CamView.CamView.UpdateHiddenDocumentState
member.summary: Updates the value of the and fires events in the currently active state according to the detected changes. This will allow the active to react to being hidden or becoming visible again.
